##: Why here? Too few stars to qualify for Scoop Extras bucket.
I first created a PR there, but it got closed: <https://github.com/ScoopInstaller/Extras/pull/16511>.
description: A lightning-fast cross-platform image viewer written in Rust
notes: Open image from command line: lightningview <imagefile.ext>
Register as default image viewer: lightningview /register
Unregister as default image viewer: lightningview /unregister
